function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Incomplete or inadequate reporting of study characteristics and results","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in the application of inclusion criteria for study selection","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of studies with cross-sectional or longitudinal methodology","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of specific sub-groups from the study","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on english, spanish, french, italian, or portuguese studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical and mental health impact of social distancing and home confinement during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of search strategies and terminology in the research protocol","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased feelings of loneliness among younger age groups during the covid-19 pandemic leading to symptoms of anxiety and depression.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse psychological outcomes associated with home confinement and social distancing during the pandemic, including emotional disorders, depression, anxiety, stress, irritability, insomnia, ptsd, anger, emotional exhaustion, risky behaviors, and increased substance abuse.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to pay attention to and strengthen the public’s mental health to minimize the consequences of loneliness and social isolation due to covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental and behavioral disorders due to social distancing and home confinement","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased interaction and communication through social media platforms can lead to the rapid spread of misinformation about contagious diseases and their prevention.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The cancellation of educational activities, such as conferences and training courses, reduces opportunities for healthcare professionals to learn about new developments in disease prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-border movement of academics and professionals leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of technical language without context","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks associated with viewpoint-independent human classification algorithm that may lead to overlooking potential health risks and disease transmission patterns","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public sharing of materials and sample videos may lead to misuse of technology for covert surveillance or unethical monitoring practices","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Availability of data in github repository","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate risk assessment due to varying contamination trends in different areas","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection and tracking of individual movement data","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of environmental noise for visualization of heat-map","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Identifying couples based on proximity and time could lead to inaccurate assumptions about their actual relationship, potentially missing true social contacts or interactions.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for identifying social distancing violations may lead to errors in detection and interpretation of human behaviors.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of people with partial visibility or truncated objects","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Benchmarking tests and comparisons conducted on a single hardware and software platform","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Training on a large number of samples from the google open images dataset, including human body parts, increases the risk of model overfitting to specific characteristics of that dataset and may not generalize well to other datasets.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing a transfer learning approach with pre-trained models may introduce biases and assumptions from the source dataset microsoft coco into the human detection model, leading to biased predictions and potential fairness issues.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using stochastic gradient descent sgd with warm restarts and a cosine annealing learning rate schedule may lead to challenges in hyperparameter tuning and model convergence, as well as the need for careful adjustment of learning rate values.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the geometric transformation and mapping in the context of computer vision","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of mosaic data augmentation, class label smoothing, and dropblock regularisation in the input part of the detection module","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of complex mathematical equations may lead to errors in implementation or understanding.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overfitting may occur due to the use of specific techniques such as dropblock and class label smoothing.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of the loss function and its parameters may lead to suboptimal training outcomes.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No analytical studies or post-processing to analyze the risk of infection distribution after people detection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis provided for the outcome of the distance violation index","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No statistical assessment on virus spread based on distance measurements","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate comparison of dnn models’ accuracy based on non-comparable ground truths","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gps data for monitoring infected individuals may raise privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High r0 value for covid-19 estimated at 2-2.5 indicates rapid spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of definite solution for treatment of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistical analysis of spatio-temporal data from people movements can reveal high-risk zones for contagious disease spread.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extensive testing and assessment in indoor and outdoor datasets may overlook specific contagious disease transmission risks in certain environments or communities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential misuse of ai-based social distancing monitoring for privacy invasion","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global outbreak of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective cure or treatment for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of transmission routes for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data entry errors in the measurement values","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of statistical values","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incremento significativo del teletrabajo a nivel mundial","category":"Working","confidence":"High"}]}
